profile.name: Niko Matsakis
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at Discord | Improving Rust Ecosystem
profile.summary: Results-driven developer with a passion for Rust programming and its ecosystem. Proven track record of contributing to open-source projects, engaging with the community, and driving innovation.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Developed and maintained multiple Rust-based projects, including a high-performance agent client protocol implementation.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Contributed to open-source projects such as rust-africa-hackathon-2026 and rust-project-goals-ndm.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained the Rust project's GitHub repository, ensuring code quality and consistency.
